_comment: Hytale Hybrid Egg. Supports x86_64 and ARM64 via QEMU.
name: Hytale Hybrid
author: zneh@github.com
description: A robust Hytale server egg with architecture-aware downloading via QEMU for ARM nodes.

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The UDP port for the Hytale server (QUIC protocol).

variables.name: Server Memory
variables.description: Memory allocation in MB for the Java process.
